title: Age Is Not the Only Risk for Severe Coronavirus Disease
description: Older people remain most at risk of dying from the new coronavirus disease, COVID-19. The majority of people who get COVID-19 have minor or moderate sickness. But “majority” does not mean “all.” So, who else should be concerned about contracting severe, even …
content: Older people remain most at risk of dying from the new coronavirus disease COVID The majority of people who get COVID have minor or moderate sickness But majority does not mean all So who else should be concerned about contracting severe even dead chars
